Interface IAffinity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Implementation interface
    Since:
    29.12.11, 20:14
    Author:
    cheremin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getAffinity

        BitSet getAffinity()
        Returns:
        returns affinity mask for current thread, or null if unknown

      • setAffinity

        void setAffinity(BitSet affinity)
        Parameters:
        affinity - sets affinity mask of current thread to specified value

      • getCpu

        int getCpu()
        Returns:
        the current cpu id, or -1 if unknown.

      • getProcessId

        int getProcessId()
        Returns:
        the process id of the current process.

      • getThreadId

        int getThreadId()
        Returns:
        the thread id of the current thread or -1 is not available.
